column5: Our gorgeous home in the most desirable neighborhood in Dallas includes a large kitchen, theater room, pool, outdoor kitchen and several living and dining areas. It's within minutes of Northpark Mall, The Galleria, Preston Center and Highland Park Village Designer shopping, the Museum District and Deep Ellum and Uptown for restaurants and nightlife, SMU, American Airlines Center; home of the Dallas Mavericks & Stars, all the best concerts.. a short drive to Nokia, Lone Star Track Horse Races.
